import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { addItemApi } from "../Services/allAPI" function Home() { const [productDetails, setProductDetails] = useState([]); const [newProduct,setNewProduct]=useState({ title:"",price:"",productImage:"" }) // handling add item fn const handleAddItem = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() const {title,price,productImage} = newProduct if(!title||!price||!productImage){ alert("Please fill all fields!!") }else{ const reqBody = new FormData() reqBody.append("title",title) reqBody.append("price",price) reqBody.append("productImage",productImage) const reqHeader = { "Content-Type":"multipart/form-data" } const result = await addItemApi(reqBody,reqHeader) if(result.status === 200){ alert("Item added successfully!!") setProductDetails([...pro]) }else{ alert("Something went wrong!!") console.log(result.response.data); } } } return ( <>
